name: Page (Bringo)
description:
The recent death of your uncle has led to you inheriting an apartment studio, doodles and concept sketches sprawl the floor and walls, Examine this abandoned place as you discover the drawings have more life than it seems.

Page is a first-person, non-Euclidian puzzler where you flip between the real world and a comic reality, manipulating the comic.

This is a demo I created for a College assignment, if there is enough interest I may develop it further.

Controls

WASD - movement

E - interact/pick up
